gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all precomputed JQL functions to analyze project metrics and make informed decisions.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all precomputed JQL functions available in the Jira instance, including their IDs and relevant metadata.

gold.user: As a data analyst, I need to update existing precomputations with new parameters to ensure that the data reflects the latest project changes.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a payload with updated parameters for the specified precomputation and return a success message along with the updated precomputation details.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to search for specific precomputations by their IDs to integrate them into our reporting tools.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a list of precomputation IDs and return the corresponding precomputation details, including their status and associated data.
